targetAudiences: Mental Health Advocates
Teachers and Guidance Counsellors
Coaches and Mentors
Parents
HR department workers and employers
Students of mental health, emergency services, or nursing

courseDetails.title: Microsoft Excel y Google Spreadsheets: Formación Completa
courseDetails.shortDescription: Microsoft Excel y Google Sheets Para Una Alta Productividad. Administre el Trabajo Diario y Cree Informes de Gestión.
targetAudiences: Profesionales de cualquier carrera empresarial que busquen dominar Microsoft Excel y Google Spreadsheets
Gerentes de ventas y empleados dispuestos a mejorar el control sobre los datos e informes de ventas
Cualquier persona dispuesta a mejorar sus habilidades de Microsoft Excel para su uso en muchas aplicaciones diferentes

courseDetails.title: Microsoft Excel Tutorial - from Beginner to Advanced
courseDetails.shortDescription: "Master Microsoft Excel with Comprehensive Tutorials from Beginner to Advanced Level"
targetAudiences: Students, job seekers, and business professionals who want to improve their Excel skills.
Anyone who wants to learn Excel from scratch and build a strong foundation for future learning.
Those who want to learn advanced features of Excel and apply them to their work or personal projects.
